summary: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.
cast: Catherine Hicks|Chris Sarandon|Alex Vincent|Brad Dourif|Dinah Manoff|Tommy Swerdlow|Jack Colvin|Neil Giuntoli|Juan Ramírez|Alan Wilder|Richard Baird|Ray Oliver|Aaron Osborne|Tyler Hard|Ted Liss|Roslyn Alexander|Bo Kane|Leila Lee Olsen|Ed Gale|Lena Sack|Tommy Gerard|Michael Chavez|Jamie Gray|Erin Munz|Jana Twomey|Suaundra Black|Edan Gross|John Franklin|Michael Patrick Carter|Jeff Dlugolecki|Hunter Marks|Robert Minkoff
title: Muñeco diabólico
